firmware.translation[0].definitions[0].d: instructions to computers that are stored on chips rather than in programs
firmware.translation[1].definitions[0].d: instructions to computers that are stored on CHIPs so that they can be done much faster, and cannot be changed or lost
firmware.translation[1].definitions[0].e: In order to download firmware from their website, you will need the serial number of your camera.
Manufacturers are considering incorporating the window manager into their firmware products.
